title: proactive and adaptive
extract: Adaptive agility is the change or modification of individuals or their behavior in order to increase their fit with the new environment (response). ... Proactive agility contains the eagerness to learn, independence, and courage.Dec 14, 2017
extract_html: Adaptive agility is the change or modification of individuals or their behavior in order to increase their fit with the new environment (response). ... Proactive agility contains the eagerness to learn, independence, and courage.Dec 14, 2017
